preqs: Students must have passed BTG1200, BTW1200 or BTW1042 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {BTG1200, BTP1010, BTW1042, BTW1200} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BTC2720, BTF2991, BTG3241, BTW3241}

description: The unit introduces students to the legal framework within which individual employment relations operate in Malaysia and Australia. Topics include important workplace relations issues like the rights and duties underpinning the contract of employment, unfair dismissal, constructive dismissal, discrimination and occupational health and safety law. Selected International Labour Organisation Conventions are analysed in relation to aspects of current employment protection law and policy.
